data.name: Open
data.comment: This is a button which is used to open your bitcoin wallet. One word only.

data.name: TwoFactorDisabledWarnMessage
data.value: Two-Factor authentication is disabled. Enable it in the Setting for greater protection.
data.comment: This is a notification message to the user that the two-factor authentication is disabled and consider enabling it.

data.name: SettingsPageViewModelCaption
data.value: Manage appearance, privacy and other settings

data.name: LoadingViewDownloadText
data.value: Downloading and processing Bitcoin network data

data.name: LoadingViewThirdparty
data.value: Ginger does this without any third party knowing about your balance and financial activity.

data.name: LoadingViewProcessLonger
data.value: This process will be longer on first launch, with larger wallets, or after long gaps between synchronizations.

data.name: RandomlySkippedRoundMessage
data.value: Skipping a round for better privacy

data.name: PlebStopMessageBelow
data.value: Add more funds or press Play to bypass

data.name: AllPrivateMessage
data.value: Hurray! All your funds are private!

data.name: CoinsRejectedMessage
data.value: Some funds are rejected from coinjoining

data.name: MiningFeeRateTooHighMessage
data.value: Mining fee rate was too high

data.name: CoordinationFeeRateTooHighMessage
data.value: Coordination fee rate was too high

data.name: MinInputCountTooLowMessage
data.value: Min input count was too low

data.name: ServerDidNotGiveFeeExemptionMessage
data.value: Server did not give remix fee exemption

data.name: CoinjoinToOtherWalletRestrictions1
data.value: - Only loaded wallets can be selected.

data.name: CoinjoinToOtherWalletRestrictions2
data.value: - Coins from the coinjoin transaction will be received by this wallet. However, this setting resets after Ginger restarts.

data.name: CoinjoinToOtherWalletRestrictions3
data.value: - The selected wallet cannot be changed when a coinjoin is in progress.

data.name: PlebStopToolTip
data.value: Coinjoin will automatically stop if the wallet balance is less than this.

data.name: WalletToolsCheckBackup
data.value: Have you checked your wallet backup?

data.name: WalletToolsRecommend
data.value: It is recommended that you verify your wallet Recovery Words from time to time.

data.name: WalletToolsDoNotForget
data.value: Your passphrase is also required to restore your wallet, do not forget it.

data.name: CoinJoinProfilesCaption
data.value: Ginger takes care of your financial privacy by automatically starting to coinjoin all your funds for a fixed 0.3% coordination fee + the mining fees. Select a coinjoin strategy that fits you best!

data.name: PrivateCoinJoinProfileDescription
data.value: Choice of the paranoid. Optimizes for privacy at all costs.

data.name: EconomicCoinJoinProfileDescription
data.value: For savers. Only participates in coinjoins during the cheapest parts of the week.

data.name: SpeedyCoinJoinProfileDescription
data.value: Getting things done. Geared towards speed and convenience.

data.name: AdvancedCoinjoinOptionsViewRedcoinToolTip
data.value: Only allow a single coin with anonymity score 1 into coinjoin registration.

data.name: AdvancedCoinjoinOptionsViewAnonTargetTooltip
data.value: Minimum anonymity score for a coin to be considered private.

data.name: AdvancedCoinjoinOptionsViewSafeFeeToolTip
data.value: Always coinjoin when the fee rate is below this value (has precedence over Coinjoin time preference).

data.name: AdvancedCoinjoinOptionsViewCoinJoinTimePrefToolTip
data.value: Only coinjoin when the fee rate is below the median of this time period.

data.name: WalletRenameCaption
data.value: You can modify the name of your wallet

data.name: UnexpextedError
data.value: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact support.

data.name: SomethingWrong
data.value: Something went wrong. Please try again.

data.name: PermissionError
data.value: Ginger Wallet was unable to perform this action due to a lack of permission.

data.name: HardwareWalletNotFound
data.value: Could not find the hardware wallet. Make sure it is connected.

data.name: TransactionCanceledOnDevice
data.value: The transaction was canceled on the device.

data.name: UnknownErrorDeviceCheck
data.value: Unknown error. Make sure the device is connected and isn't busy, then try again.

data.name: CoinAlreadySpent
data.value: At least one coin you are trying to spend is already spent.

data.name: CoinInUnconfirmedChain
data.value: At least one coin you are trying to spend is part of a long or heavy chain of unconfirmed transactions. You must wait for some previous transactions to confirm.

data.name: TransactionNotFinal
data.value: The transaction is not final and cannot be broadcasted.

data.name: BalanceNotAccurateServerConnection
data.value: The reported balance might not be accurate, and some other features may not be available because Ginger was unable to connect to the server. Retrying to connect.

data.name: ApplicationRestartApplyChanges
data.value: After pressing Continue, the application will restart to apply changes.

data.name: CoordinationFeeInfo
data.value: You will pay a fee of 0.3% only for new coins you coinjoin.

data.name: TransactionFeeInfo
data.value: You will pay mining fees for every coinjoin.

data.name: PlebsDontPayInfo
data.value: You won't pay the coordination fee for coins that are less than or equal to 0.01 BTC.

data.name: FriendsDontPayInfo
data.value: You won't pay the coordination fee for coins received from other Ginger coinjoins.

data.name: SeparateWithCommaOrEnter
data.value: Separate with , or by pressing Enter

data.name: EnterNamesForAddress
data.value: Enter the names of the persons or companies who you will give this address to

data.name: UnableToSendAddressToDevice
data.value: Unable to send the address to the device

data.name: ChooseHideModifyDisplayAddresses
data.value: You can choose to hide, modify, or display the addresses listed below

data.name: WishToHideAddressWithLabels
data.value: Do you wish to hide the address with the following labels?

data.name: EditSelectedAddressLabels
data.value: Edit the selected address's labels here:

data.name: ChangesAppliedAfterRestart
data.value: Changes will be applied after restarting the application.

data.name: ModifyingSettingsNotPossible
data.value: Modifying settings is not possible, as certain parameters have been overridden during startup.

data.name: ApplyNewSettingRestart
data.value: To apply the new setting, Ginger Wallet needs to be restarted.

data.name: RunInBackgroundWhenClosed
data.value: Run in background when window closed

data.name: CannotModifyWithTwoFactorEnabled
data.value: Cannot be modified when Two-Factor authentication is enabled.

data.name: TerminateTorWhenShutdown
data.value: Terminate Tor when Ginger shuts down

data.name: SetPreferredBrowserPath
data.value: Set the full path of the preferred browser

data.name: CouldNotSaveChange
data.value: Couldn't save your change, please see the logs for further information.

data.name: WasabiDownloadBlocksFromFullNode
data.value: Wasabi will download blocks from a full node you control.

data.name: CoinsReceivedFromOthers
data.value: Coins received from others to already used addresses won't appear below this amount. To prevent potential dust attacks.

data.name: UseDecimalPoint
data.value: Use decimal point instead of comma.

data.name: EnableGPURendering
data.value: When enabled use a graphics card (GPU) to render user interface. Using a GPU rather than the CPU can improve performance.

data.name: OnlyAvailableWhenTorEnabled
data.value: Only available when Tor is enabled.

data.name: PrivacyProtectedWithPayjoin
data.value: Your privacy is being protected with payjoin.

data.name: EntitiesKnowTransaction
data.value: Those entities know this is your transaction. Coinjoin more or use the label management tool to carefully select who would know that this transaction is yours.

data.name: EntitiesKnowThisIsYourTransaction
data.value: Those entities know this is your transaction. Coinjoin more or use the label management tool to carefully select who would know that this transaction is yours.

data.name: EntitiesCanDeanonymizeTransaction
data.value: Some entities can deanonymize this transaction because it spends coins with no privacy. Coinjoin more to have enough private coins for this transaction.

data.name: TransactionNotPrivateEnough
data.value: This transaction is not private enough because it spends not fully private coins. Coinjoin more to have enough private coins for this transaction.

data.name: ChangeCanLinkTransactions
data.value: Change can be used to link this transaction with the next transaction that will use it. Use the change avoidance suggestion to send a little more or less if this is OK for the receiver, or coinjoin the change later.

data.name: ReducePrivacyOfTransaction
data.value: This might reduce the privacy of your transaction.

data.name: UnconfirmedCoinsMayCauseIssues
data.value: This may cause your transaction to be rejected, or delay its confirmation, or cost more than needed to get it confirmed within the desired time. Wait for a confirmation to only use confirmed coins.

data.name: TransactionMayBeReplacedByCoinjoin
data.value: This may cause your transaction to be replaced by the coinjoin. Consider waiting for the current coinjoin to be finished before sending this transaction.

data.name: ChooseLabelsForTransaction
data.value: Choose labels to link with this transaction.

data.name: ChangeTransactionFeeOrConfirmationTime
data.value: Change transaction fee or confirmation time

data.name: ConfirmationTimeEstimation
data.value: This is just an estimation based on some data for transactions and blocks. The confirmation time might change.

data.name: UnableToExportPSBT
data.value: Ginger Wallet was unable to export the PSBT.

data.name: TransactionFeeExceedsPaymentAmount
data.value: The transaction cannot be sent because its fee is more than the payment amount.

data.name: UnableToCreateTransaction
data.value: Ginger Wallet was unable to create your transaction.

data.name: InsufficientFundsForTransactionFee
data.value: There are not enough funds to cover the transaction fee.

data.name: UnableToSendTransaction
data.value: Ginger Wallet was unable to send your transaction.

data.name: BitcoinAddressValidity
data.value: Bitcoin address is valid for {0} and not for {1}.

data.name: SetTransactionConfirmationPreference
data.value: Set your preference for how fast the transaction should be confirmed.

data.name: TransactionFeeEstimationsUnavailable
data.value: Transaction fee estimations are not available at the moment. Try again later or you can enter the fee rate manually.

data.name: ChooseTransactionVisibility
data.value: Choose who can and can't see this transaction.

data.name: NoInformationAboutPeople
data.value: There is no information about these people, only use it when necessary!

data.name: RecoveryWordsViewCaption
data.value: Write down the recovery words in the correct order and store them in a safe place. They are needed to recover your wallet.

data.name: RecoveryWordsViewNotSeeAfter
data.value: You will not be able to see these words again once the wallet is created.

data.name: ConfirmRecoveryWordsViewModelStoreSafely
data.value: Store your passphrase safely, it cannot be reset if lost. It's needed to open and to recover your wallet. It's a recovery words extension for more security.

data.name: TrimWarnMessage
data.value: Leading and trailing white spaces will be removed!

data.name: WhitespaceMessage
data.value: Leading and trailing white spaces are not allowed!

data.name: ConnectHardwareWalletViewModelCaption
data.value: Connect your hardware wallet to the PC

data.name: ConnectHardwareWalletViewModelEnterPassphrase
data.value: Enter your passphrase on the hardware wallet if needed.

data.name: HardwareWalletAuthDialogViewModelCaption
data.value: Connect your hardware wallet, press Continue and then follow the instructions on the device.

data.name: ConnectHardwareWalletViewModelConnectPc
data.value: Connect the hardware wallet to the PC / Enter the PIN on the device.

data.name: ConnectHardwareWalletViewModelMakeSureOnlyOne
data.value: Make sure you have only one hardware wallet connected to the PC.

data.name: ConnectHardwareWalletViewModelAlreadyAdded
data.value: The connected hardware wallet is already added to the software, click below to open it or click Rescan to search again.

data.name: ConnectHardwareWalletViewModelEnterPassphraseOnDevice
data.value: Enter your passphrase on your device.

data.name: ConnectHardwareWalletViewModelEnterPin
data.value: Enter your PIN on your device.

data.name: TypeInYourRecoveryWords
data.value: Type in your recovery words in the correct order

data.name: RecoverWalletViewModelPassphraseMessage
data.value: If you used a passphrase when you created your wallet you must type it below, otherwise leave this empty.

data.name: AmountLessThanTotalSupply
data.value: Amount must be less than the total supply of BTC.

data.name: InsufficientFunds
data.value: Insufficient funds to cover the amount requested.

data.name: AmountMoreThanZero
data.value: Amount must be more than 0 BTC.

data.name: InvalidBTCAddressOrURI
data.value: Input a valid BTC address or URI.

data.name: PayjoinNotPossibleWithHardwareWallets
data.value: Payjoin is not possible with hardware wallets.

data.name: TermsAndConditionsViewCaption
data.value: To continue using Ginger, please accept the terms and conditions

data.name: ApplicationRestartRescan
data.value: The application will restart, and upon reopening your wallet, the rescan will begin. This process may take some time, depending on the number of transactions in your wallet.

data.name: SelfCoinJoinToolTip
data.value: In this Coinjoin, the majority of the coins belong to you. This will significantly reduce your privacy progress. Consider participating with fewer wallets until more participants join.
